attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current system of inheritance tax currently affects only 6% of estates. It brings in £3.6bn in revenue that helps to provide vital public services. 

If the government plans tax cuts, we believe that there are far better ways of cutting tax that will benefit a far greater majority of the population. 

We urge the government to resist pressure from the press and keep it's current inheritance tax regime, making only occasional inflation based adjustments.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Keep Inheritance Tax."
